Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2007 09:50PM karen1 wrote: Harley,  Did you respond and say you were taking Taxotere and Cytoxan.  How is it going,  any side effects,   I start on thursday for 4 treatments every 3 weeks.  Also my onc. did not think I needed a port?  Anyone else go thru without one?
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in September?? where are you ladies Methusala StillKicking

Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2007 08:27PM karen1 wrote: I finished 4 tx of taxotere and cytoxan on Nov 15.  My hair is continuing to fall out and I really don't see any regrowth yet.  Has anyone else had that experince.  I still have eyebrows and lashes but my hair was growing some but very brittle between treatments (all white) but now that I'm finished it is like all the damaged dry hair is falling out and I barely have anything covering my scalp.  When does this hair grow back????? Karen
